sentences.en: A layout of the kind used by programmers is called a flowchart.
sentences.cn: 程序设计员所用的一种总的布局叫做流程图.

sentences.en: Adds a board of directors symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将董事会符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: Adds a information systems symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将信息系统符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: Adds a international division symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将国际分支机构符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: Adds a international marketing symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将国际营销符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: Adds a personnel and staff symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将员工和职员符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: Adds a quality assurance symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将质保符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: Adds an accounts payable symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将应付款符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: Adds an accounts receivable symbol to your workflow flowchart.
sentences.cn: 将应收款符号添加到您的工作流程图中.

sentences.en: In this flowchart, the first decision you must make revolves around the important distinction between strategic and overhead.
sentences.cn: 在这个流程图中，您要做出的第一个决策就是战略和经费的重要区别。

sentences.en: Indicates a comparison between two items on your flowchart.
sentences.cn: 表示流程图中两个项目之间的比较.

sentences.en: Most of the BPM tools are considered as either tools to draw a flowchart or a workflow modeler from business requirements, which generates some implementation artifacts like code.
sentences.cn: 大多数 BPM 工具被视为绘制流程图的工具或根据业务需求建模的工作流建模器，以生成一些类似代码的实现构件。

sentences.en: The factory manager used a flowchart to explain the production process.
sentences.cn: 工厂经理用一幅作业图来说明生产过程.

sentences.en: The flowchart for this is shown at the top of the opposite page.
sentences.cn: 这个程序的框图在反面一页的上方示出.

sentences.en: The second chapter looks at the flowchart of the job evaluation.
sentences.cn: 在第2章,分析了职务评价的流程.

sentences.en: The second decision in the flowchart asks if the package software is immediately useful.
sentences.cn: 流程图中的第二个决策就是询问数据包软件是否能立刻起作用。

sentences.en: The system software adopts modularization program, shows the flowchart of every module.
sentences.cn: 系统软件采用模块化编程方法, 给出了各个模块的程序流程图.

sentences.en: The system's flowchart and every model's modeling are illuminated.
sentences.cn: 说明了各模型的建模方法以及系统的仿真流程.
